name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with extensive expertise in **Python**, **Node.js**, and **API development**, leveraging over 13 years of experience in delivering robust applications across various domains. Proficient in database management with **PostgreSQL** and adept in cloud infrastructure and development using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD pipelines**. Experienced in Linux environments and skilled in **shell scripting**, ensuring high-performance and scalable solutions. 
Passionate about building secure and efficient systems with a strong understanding of email protocols such as **SMTP**, **IMAP**, as well as experience with various email technologies including **Postfix**, **Dovecot**, and compliance mechanisms like **SPF**, **DKIM**, and **DMARC**. Demonstrated ability to handle queue management systems and implement rate limiting and bounce processing strategies. Committed to developing high-quality software, utilizing agile methodologies, and aligning technical solutions with industry standards.

Maintained and monitored DNS settings to ensure reliable message delivery and compliance with email best practices.
Implemented rate limiting and bounce processing strategies to manage email flow efficiently and reduce spam.
Collaborated with teams to manage queue management systems effectively, ensuring high availability and reliability of messaging services.

Collaborated in a cross-functional team to ensure system robustness, effectively troubleshooting issues across the email infrastructure and databases.
